about_the_game:
Description

Rocket Smash is a minimalist 2D physics and destruction arcade game. Navigate through countless arena levels, relentlessly smashing, bashing and crashing into enemy rockets to annihilate them. This game is all about precision, strategy, and the joy of destruction!


Controls

Rocket Smash is extremely easy to pick up and play. You'll only need your mouse - just point and click!


Campaign

The campaign comprises numerous arena-style levels, grouped into sets of ten. In each set, you'll encounter fresh enemy types and interactive objects, with the ultimate challenge waiting in the form of a boss battle on the last level. Plus, the excitement never ends, as new levels will be released every single week, ensuring there's always more to conquer in the campaign!


Enemies

Within this game, you'll face more than 40 different enemy types. Each enemy has a unique ability, and more difficult enemies will adopt multiple enemy abilities! As you progress through the campaign you will also encounter faster, stronger and more powerful variants of each enemy that will push your Rocket Smashing skills to their limits!

Soundtrack

Music is a big part of Rocket Smash - each level set is accompanied by an upbeat and energetic track that perfectly complements the action. Get ready to groove to the rhythm of each level as you smash your way to victory!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.9.5
  • Processor: 2.5GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

name: Rocket Smash Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: 2.5GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 760
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
